room_title: Escape room "Cabin" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: So much fun! My friends and I did the Cabin for my husbands birthday. We had to ask for one clue (out of three) but made it out with about 8 minutes to spare! We had 5 in our group and I fit in the rooms just fine. It was fun and took teamwork to finish. We are hoping to come back soon and do the virus room!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: This our first time ever doing an escape room. We played the Cabin room and we had no idea how challenging it was going to be! We had the best time and will be back to play the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: Staff was really awesome and the concept of these rooms are excellent. Highly recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: We went for a friend's birthday and had a BLAST! They were so friendly from start to finish and I know we will be back soon. I would recommend this escape room to all of my friends.
